Replying to @DavidDarnes 2019-05-17 13:56
@DavidDarnes @Una On transport, esp on a plane, the noise cancelling is superb. I feel like I can enjoy content at lower volumes as a result. That was something I was looking for when I was shopping for these. Previously I had some good noise isolating Shure in-ears. But prefer the cancelling.
